${ModID}:Strike.NAME: Strike
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: We've lost so many wizards we have to send our apprentices to the battle field.  Some of them are only good at hitting the monsters with a stick.

${ModID}:Defend.NAME: Defend
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: A shield isn't as good as a spell but at least you can learn to use it faster.

${ModID}:IceDamage.NAME: Cold
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 #yFrostbite for every 3 damage dealt.
Frostbite
When an enemy with Frostbite attacks they take damage equal to their Frostbite and reduce Frostbite by 1.

${ModID}:DarkDamage.NAME: Dark
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 #yTemporary #yHP for every 2 unblocked damage dealt.
Temporary HP
Temporary HP is lost at the end of battle.

${ModID}:ForceDamage.NAME: Force
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 #yCrushed for every 6 damage dealt.
Crushed
Crushed enemies take more damage from attacks.

${ModID}:AcidSpray.NAME: Acid Spray
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Not one of my favored elements, but it's great for eating through defenses.

${ModID}:Miasma.NAME: Miasma
${ModID}:Miasma.DESCRIPTION: Apply !arcanistmod:M2! Weak. NL Target deals !M! less damage with attacks this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The victims can never say what exactly was wrong with them, only that it was a horrible feeling.

${ModID}:FrozenLance.NAME: Frozen Lance
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This spell was invented by the Aqualance?  What kind of stupid name is that?

${ModID}:PhantomFist.NAME: Phantom Fist
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: It's like hitting them with a fist, except the fist is the size of a watermelon and made of steel.

${ModID}:VoidTendrils.NAME: Void Tendrils
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: It is a fantastic spell for offense and defense but it looks evil so NOOOOOO, we shouldn't use it.

${ModID}:Rapids.NAME: Rapids
${ModID}:Rapids.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, discard !M! random card to draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Rapids.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, discard !M! random card to draw !M! card.

${ModID}:Barrier.NAME: Barrier
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: A great spell for when you need to defend yourself but stay mobile.

${ModID}:Blink.NAME: Blink
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Many times, the best defense is simply not being there.

${ModID}:BarrierJa.NAME: Barrierja
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Who the fuck named it that?

${ModID}:SoulFlame.NAME: SoulFlame
${ModID}:SoulFlame.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Discard a card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The great thing about soul flame is that it isn't the body that's burning, so your ice spells still work!

${ModID}:WhirlpoolSigil.NAME: Whirlpool Sigil
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The great thing about sigils is they can be prepared ahead of time, so they don't use up your mana.
Sigils can not be played.

${ModID}:BrrZerk.NAME: Brr Zerk
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This difficult technique is not a spell, but a way to alter your spells to also freeze the target.

${ModID}:Gale.NAME: Gale
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Pushing your opponent away is a great way to get room for a stronger spell.

${ModID}:Eruption.NAME: Eruption
${ModID}:Eruption.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: All right, shit like this is why I studied magic!

${ModID}:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
${ModID}:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play an attack each turn, draw !M! card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: If you can cast spells and run at the same time, that is much better than being a sitting duck.  Don't neglect your physical training.

${ModID}:Spray.NAME: Spray
${ModID}:Spray.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard your entire hand and gain !M! Block for each card discarded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: A simple propulsion spell is so much more deadly when you carry a lot of small sharp metal objects.

${ModID}:Dash.NAME: Dash
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Not my favorite strategy, but sometimes you just gotta run like fuck.

${ModID}:Haste.NAME: Haste
${ModID}:Haste.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! card and discard !M! card.
${ModID}:Haste.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! card and discard !M! card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: It's a spell, not a skill.  Why would you call it that?
